preview.salaryXPath: //td[contains(text(), '給与') or contains(text(), '時給') or contains(text(), '日給') or contains(text(), '月給')]/following-sibling::td[1]
preview.salaryInIframeSelector: body > div > article > div > div.bg01 > div > div.pt03 > dl:nth-child(2) > dd > ul > li
preview.jobTypeInIframeSelector: body > div > article > div > div.bg01 > div > div.pt03 > dl:nth-child(1) > dd > ul > li
preview.prefectureInIframeXPath: //*[contains(text(), '都') or contains(text(), '道') or contains(text(), '府') or contains(text(), '県')][1]
preview.workLocationFallbackSelector: body > div > article > div > div.bg01 > div > div.pt12 > div.pt12b > dl:nth-child(3) > dd > ul > li
preview.cityInIframeXPath: //*[contains(text(), '区') or contains(text(), '市') or contains(text(), '町') or contains(text(), '村')][1]
